title: The Wild Hunt
description: Faeries, Valkyrie’s and Demon’s, oh my!After ten years stuck in an endless cycle of torture, torment and servitude, I finally escape, only to find myself being arrested for a crime that I wish I’d committed.I almost resign myself to a life in prison, blissfully terrifying my irritating roommate, when two surprising visitors present me with an offer that I can’t refuse.The catch?I have to go back to the place that I sacrificed so much to escape from.What could possibly go wrong, right?
author: Naomi Panthera
